summary.span: 封装 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序。

span.span: Encapsulates a Windows Presentation Foundation application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个封装了 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 特定于应用程序的功能的类，其中包括： is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **应用程序生存期**： 、 、 、、、、、、 、 。**Application Lifetime**: , , , , , , , , , . - **应用程序作用域窗口、属性和资源管理**： 、 、 、 、 、、 、、。**Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: , , , , , , , , . - **命令行参数和退出代码处理**： 、 、 。**Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: , , . - **导航**： 、 、 、 、 、 、、、。**Navigation**: , , , , , , , , . 实现单独模式以提供对其窗口、属性和资源范围服务的共享访问。 implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services. 因此，只能 为每个创建类的一个实例 。Consequently, only one instance of the class can be created per . 可以 使用标记、标记和代码隐藏来实现，也可以使用代码来实现。You can implement an using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 如果 是通过标记实现的，无论标记、标记和代码隐藏，都必须将标记文件配置为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` 项。If is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item. > [!NOTE] > 独立应用程序不需要 对象; 可以实现自定义 `static` 入口点方法 (`Main`) 打开窗口而不创建实例 。A standalone application does not require an object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of . 但是， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 需要 对象。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] require an object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用仅标记定义标准应用程序：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppMarkup.xaml#applicationmarkup)] 下面的示例演示如何使用代码仅定义标准应用程序：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppCode.cs#applicationcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/appcode.vb#applicationcode)] 下面的示例演示如何使用标记和代码隐藏的组合定义标准应用程序。The following example shows how a standard application is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#applicationxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#applicationcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#applicationcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能 根据创建类的一个实例 ，以确保对一组应用程序范围窗口、属性和资源数据进行共享访问。Only one instance of the class can be created per , to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data. 因此，类的无参数构造函数 检测要初始化的实例是否是中的第一个实例 ; 如果不是，则 引发。Consequently, the parameterless constructor of the class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an ; if it is not, an is thrown. 当前的对象 是从静态属性公开的 。The object for the current is exposed from the static property.

summary.span: 当应用程序成为前台应用程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已激活一个或多个打开的 windows 的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序 (成为前台应用程序) 当应用程序启动时第一次激活某个 windows，或在应用程序处于非活动状态时激活某个 windows 时：具体而言，在以下情况下会发生激活：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - 应用程序打开其第一个窗口。An application opens its first window. - 用户使用 ALT + TAB 或使用任务管理器切换到该应用程序。A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 用户单击应用程序中某个窗口的任务栏按钮。A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application. 需要检测激活时间的应用程序可以处理 事件。Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the event. 第一次激活应用程序后，它可能会在其生存期内停用并多次重新激活。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，则它可以处理 和 事件以确定它所在的激活状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which activation state it's in. 当应用程序激活后， 在应用程序停用之前将不会再次引发，而不管应用程序处于活动状态时，应用程序中的多少窗口处于激活状态。Once an application becomes active, will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active. 不会为引发 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在独立应用程序激活和停用时进行检测。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application activates and deactivates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个每 单独实现静态属性的类型， 用于为当前的实例提供共享访问 。 is a per- singleton type that implements the static property to provide shared access to the instance for the current . 此设计可确保由管理的状态 （包括共享资源和状态）可从单个共享位置获得。This design guarantees that state managed by , including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location. 此属性是线程安全的，可从任何线程获得。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.

summary.span: 当应用程序停止作为前台应用程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户执行以下操作时，具有一个或多个打开的 Windows 的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序 (停止成为前台应用程序) ：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - 使用 ALT + TAB 或使用任务管理器切换到其他应用程序。Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 单击另一应用程序中窗口的任务栏按钮。Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application. 需要检测停用的应用程序可以处理 事件。Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the event. 第一次激活应用程序后，它可能会在其生存期内停用并多次重新激活。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，则它可以处理 和 事件以确定其所在的状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which state it's in. 不会为引发 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在独立应用程序停用和激活时进行检测。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application deactivates and activates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

summary.span: 在异常由应用程序引发但未进行处理时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 捕获未处理的异常，并通过对话框通知用户 (异常，用户可以从中报告异常) ，并自动关闭应用程序。By default, Windows Presentation Foundation catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application. 但是，如果应用程序需要从集中位置执行自定义的未经处理的异常处理，则应处理 。However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle . 由 主 UI 线程上运行的代码未处理的每个异常引发。 is raised by an for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread. 如果未在后台 UI 线程上处理异常 (具有自身) 的线程 ，或 (没有) 的线程的后台工作线程 ，则不会将异常转发到主 UI 线程。If an exception is not handled on either a background UI thread (a thread with its own ) or a background worker thread (a thread without a ), the exception is not forwarded to the main UI thread. 因此， 不会引发。Consequently, is not raised. 在这些情况下，你将需要编写代码来执行以下操作：In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1. 处理后台线程中的异常。Handle exceptions on the background thread. 2. 将这些异常调度到主 UI 线程。Dispatch those exceptions to the main UI thread. 3. 在主 UI 线程上重新引发它们，而不处理它们以允许 引发。Rethrow them on the main UI thread without handling them to allow to be raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [线程模型](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model) 概述。For more information, see the [Threading Model](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model) overview. 向 事件处理程序传递包含与异常相关的 上下文信息的参数，其中包括：The event handler is passed a argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - ) (异常 。The exception (). - 从中产生 () 。The from which it originated (). 您可以使用此信息来确定异常是否可恢复。You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not. 例如，可恢复的异常可能是，而无法恢复的异常可能是 。A recoverable exception might be a , for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a , for example. 当处理中的未处理异常 ，并且不希望 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 继续处理它时，需要将 属性设置为 `true` 。When you process an unhandled exception from , and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the property to `true`. 不同于引发的其他事件 ，没有 (OnDispatcherUnhandledException) 匹配的受保护虚拟实现。Unlike the other events that raises, does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException). 因此，从派生的类 必须始终向注册事件处理程序 以处理未经处理的异常。Consequently, classes that derive from must always register an event handler with to process unhandled exceptions. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过处理事件来处理未经处理的异常 。The following example shows how to process unhandled exceptions by handling the event. [!code-csharp[handling-unhandled-exceptions](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs)] [!code-vb[handling-unhandled-exceptions](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Exit As ExitEventHandler

summary.span: 恰好在应用程序关闭之前发生，无法取消。

span.span: Occurs just before an application shuts down and cannot be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于以下原因之一，应用程序可能会关闭：An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - 对象的方法 以显式方式或由属性确定的方式调用 。The method of the object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the property. - 用户通过注销或关闭来结束该会话。The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down. 可以通过处理事件来检测应用程序关闭发生的时间 ，并根据需要执行任何其他处理。You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the event, and perform any additional processing as required. 当不需要显式调用时，还可以处理以检查或更改应用程序退出代码 。You can also handle to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call explicitly. 退出代码是从 传递给事件处理程序的自变量的属性公开的 。The exit code is exposed from the property of the argument that's passed to the event handler. 当应用程序停止运行时，会将退出代码传递到操作系统以进行后续处理。When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing. 如果你的应用程序处理该 事件并随后取消该事件， 则不会引发该事件，应用程序会根据关闭模式继续运行。If your application handles the event and subsequently cancels it, is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode. 可以从设置退出代码 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] ，但该值会被忽略。The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored. 对于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] ， 在下列情况下将引发：For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], is raised in the following circumstances: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]离开了。An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is navigated away from. - 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] ，当承载的选项卡 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] 关闭时。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is closed. - 关闭浏览器时。When the browser is closed. 在所有情况下， 均忽略属性的值。In all cases, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何执行以下操作：The following example demonstrates how to: - 处理 事件。Handle the event. - 检查和更新 的属性 。Inspect and update the property of the . - 在独立存储中将条目写入到应用程序日志。Write an entry to an application log in isolated storage. - 将应用程序状态保存到独立存储。Persist the application state to isolated storage. [!code-xaml[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handleexitxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handleexitcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handleexitcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将首先查看指定资源的应用程序范围资源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 应用程序范围的资源由管理 ，并从 属性公开。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果在应用程序范围的资源集中找不到指定的资源， 则接下来会搜索系统资源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系统资源是由用户定义的 shell 资源，包括颜色、字体和 shell 配置。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 它们 分别从、 和 类型公开为静态属性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 为了使用 获取它们，这些类型还会公开旨在传递到的资源键属性 ; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 由于 返回对象，因此如果找到该资源，则必须将返回的值强制转换为相应的类型。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果对找不到的键调用此方法，则会引发异常。If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown. 如果你不想处理通过调用而导致的异常 ，则调用 ; `null` 当找不到请求的资源时，将返回引用，并且不会引发异常。If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling , call instead; returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception. 此方法是线程安全的，可从任何线程调用。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来查找资源，并处理 是否找不到资源。The following example shows how to use to find a resource, and to handle if the resource is not found. [!code-csharp[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的主窗口。

span.span: Gets or sets the main window of the application.

value.span: 一个指定为应用程序主窗口的 。

span.span: A that is designated as the main application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动使用对要 在中实例化的第一个对象的引用进行设置 。 is automatically set with a reference to the first object to be instantiated in the . 您可以通过将 其他 对象赋给属性来指定其他主窗口 。You can specify a different main window by setting assigning another object to the property. 如果 对象的属性 设置为，则 关闭主窗口将导致应用程序关闭。If the property of the object is set to , closing the main window causes the application to shut down. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 如果应用程序的主窗口不是通过在中设置属性生成的窗口，则可以从设置属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。It is possible to set the property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 此方法的两个限制 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 是：The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - 您可以指定一个 " [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 仅限 " 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] "仅 " 作为主窗口。You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only as the main window. - 您必须设置 您指定的窗口的属性，否则将不会显示。You must set the property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown. 对要实例化的第一个对象的引用 也作为第一项添加到 集合中。The reference to the first object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the collection. 如果 随后使用对其他对象的引用进行设置 ，则对主窗口的引用的项的位置将发生更改，而中项的顺序将保持不变 。If is subsequently set with a reference to a different , the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in remains the same. 因此，始终使用 来引用主窗口，而不是中的第一项 。Consequently, always use to refer to the main window instead of the first item in . > [!NOTE] > 如果主窗口是 ，并且您需要对成员的特定访问权限 ，则需要将的值强制转换 为 。If the main window is a , and you need specific access to members, you will need to cast the value of to . > > 此属性仅在创建对象的线程中可用 。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找主应用程序窗口。The following example shows how to find the main application window. [!code-csharp[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] 下面的示例演示如何使用设置 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#SetApplicationMainWindowXAML](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/XAML/App.xaml#setapplicationmainwindowxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何 在应用程序启动过程中在代码中实例化。The following example shows how to instantiate the in code during application startup. [!code-csharp[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)] [!code-vb[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 可用于存储应用程序范围属性的字典。 exposes a dictionary via which you can use to store application-scope properties. 这使你能够以线程安全方式在中的所有代码之间共享状态 ，而无需编写你自己的状态代码。This allows you to share state amongst all code in an in a thread-safe fashion, without the need to write your own state code. 存储在中 的属性必须转换为返回的相应类型。Properties stored in must be converted to the appropriate type returned. 属性是线程安全的，可从任何线程获取。The property is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用创建和使用应用程序范围的属性 。The following example shows how create and use an application-scope property using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 资源在运行时根据条目程序集解析，该程序集由方法返回的值标识 。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] resources are resolved at run time with respect to the entry assembly, which is identified by the value returned from the method. 入口程序集是返回的程序集 ，可以是以下内容：The entry assembly is the assembly that is returned by and could be the following: - 默认应用程序域中的可执行程序集。The executable assembly in the default application domain. - 要通过调用执行的第一个程序集 。The first assembly to be executed by calling . 但是，在以下情况下， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 程序集无法获取对条目程序集的引用：In the following cases, however, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly cannot get a reference to the entry assembly: - 非托管 (本机) 应用程序承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 程序集。An unmanaged (native) application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly. - 托管应用程序 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 通过使用以外的方法将程序集加载到新应用程序域中来承载程序集 。A managed application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly by loading it into a new application domain using a method other than . 在这两种情况下 ， `null` 将返回，并且 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 无法解析程序集的资源。In both of these cases, returns `null`, and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly's resources cannot be resolved. 在这些情况下，只能 使用对应该用于解析资源的程序集的引用来设置。In these cases, can be set, once only, with a reference to the assembly that should be used to resolve resources. 只能设置一次，因为加载程序集后资源程序集不太可能会更改 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 。 can only be set once because it is unlikely that the resource assembly will change after the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly is loaded. > [!NOTE] > 当 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 程序集可以发现入口程序集时，不能设置，也就是说，当 返回对程序集的引用而不是 `null` 。 cannot be set when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly can discover the entry assembly - that is, when returns a reference to an assembly rather than `null`. 此属性是线程安全的，可从任何线程获得。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序范围资源（如样式和画笔）的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of application-scope resources, such as styles and brushes.

value.span: 一个包含零个或多个应用程序范围资源的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains zero or more application-scope resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于跨应用程序的窗口和元素共享资源。The property can be used to share resources across the windows and elements of an application. 此外，该 属性包含在资源查找路径中，按以下顺序遍历：Additionally, the property is included in the resource lookup path, which is traversed in the following order: 1. 元素Elements 2. WindowsWindows 3. 4. 系统System 因此， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素可以绑定到应用程序范围的资源。Consequently, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements can bind to application-scope resources. 此外，如果资源发生更改，资源系统将确保绑定到这些资源的元素属性会自动更新以反映所做的更改。Additionally, if resources change, the resource system ensures that element properties which are bound to those resources are automatically updated to reflect the change. 应用程序范围的资源提供了一种简单的方法来支持应用程序中的一致主题。Application-scope resources provide a simple way to support a consistent theme across your application. 通过使用标记，可以在中轻松创建主题 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] `Application.Resources` 。You can easily create a theme in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] by using the `Application.Resources` tag. 但是，如果你的应用程序支持多个主题，其中可能包含大量主题元素，则使用 每个主题的一个实例来管理它们可能会更容易。However, if your application supports multiple themes, which may contain a large number of theme elements, it might be easier to manage them using one instance for each theme. 通过这种方式，可以通过将资源属性设置为相应的来应用新的主题 。In this way, a new theme can be applied by setting the Resources property to the appropriate . 使用时有两个注意事项 。There are two considerations to make when using . 首先，字典 *键* 是一个对象，因此，如果设置和获取属性 (值，则需要使用完全相同的对象实例，请注意，使用字符串) 时，该键区分大小写。First, the dictionary *key* is an object, so you need to use exactly the same object instance when both setting and getting a property value (note that the key is case-sensitive when using a string). 其次，字典 *值* 是一个对象，因此在获取属性值时，需要将该值转换为所需的类型。Second, the dictionary *value* is an object, so you will need to convert the value to the desired type when getting a property value. 是线程安全的，可从任何线程获得。 is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 此示例演示如何将 XAML 与应用程序范围资源一起使用来创建一致的视觉外观。This example illustrates how to use XAML together with application-scope resources to create a consistent visual appearance. 第一个示例来自 *app.xaml*;第二个（来自 *mainwindow.xaml*）。The first example is from *App.xaml*; the second, from *MainWindow.xaml*. [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#ResourcesPropertyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/App.xaml#resourcespropertyxaml)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#WindowBackgroundPropertyXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml?highlight=7)] 下面的示例演示如何在 c # WPF 项目中的 App.config 文件中或在 Visual Basic WPF) 项目中的应用程序 .xaml 文件中设置应用程序资源 (。The following example shows how to set an application resource in code and XAML (in the App.xaml file in a C# WPF project or the Application.xaml file in a Visual Basic WPF project). [!code-csharp[Setting-an-application-resource-in-code](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[Setting-an-application-resource-in-code](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-xaml[Setting-an-application-resource-in-XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml?highlight=8-10)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中获取应用程序资源。The following example shows how to get an application resource in code. [!code-csharp[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用以启动 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 应用程序。 is called to start a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application. 如果定义 使用标记，或标记和代码隐藏，则 将隐式调用。If you define your using markup, or markup and code-behind, will be called implicitly. 但是，如果您 使用代码定义，则需要显式调用 。However, if you define your using code, you will need to explicitly call . 调用时，会将 新的 实例附加到 UI 线程。When is called, attaches a new instance to the UI thread. 接下来， 调用对象的 方法，该方法启动消息泵来处理 windows 消息。Next, the object's method is called, which starts a message pump to process windows messages. 最后， 对象调用对象的 方法来引发 事件。Finally, the object calls the object's the method to raise the event. 因此，应用程序执行模型已在处理时建立 ，此时应用程序被视为正在运行。Consequently, the application execution model has been established by the time you handle , at which point the application is considered to be running. 当调用时，应用程序停止运行 ; 属性的值 确定何时 调用，以及它是自动发生还是需要显式调用它。An application stops running when is called; the value of the property determines when is called, and whether it happens automatically or you need to explicitly call it. 只能从创建对象的线程调用 。 can be called only from the thread that creates the object. 此外， 不能从调用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] 。Also, cannot be called from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个使用自定义的应用程序， 因此必须显式调用 。The following example shows an application that uses a custom and must therefore explicitly call . [!code-csharp[ApplicationRunSnippets#CustomEntryPointAndRunCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationRunSnippets/CSharp/App.cs#customentrypointandruncode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationRunSnippets#CustomEntryPointAndRunCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationRunSnippets/visualbasic/app.vb#customentrypointandruncode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SessionEnding As SessionEndingCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户通过注销或关闭操作系统来结束 Windows 会话时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user ends the Windows session by logging off or shutting down the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当 Windows 会话结束时，应用程序会关闭，这在用户注销或关闭时发生。By default, an application shuts down when the Windows session ends, which occurs when a user logs off or shuts down. 发生这种情况时，Windows 会要求每个打开的应用程序关闭。When this happens, Windows asks each open application to shut down. 但是，在发生这种情况时，应用程序可能不能关闭。However, it is possible that an application may not be ready to shut down when this occurs. 例如，应用程序的数据可能处于不一致的状态，或者处于长时间运行的操作的中间。For example, an application may have data that is in an inconsistent state, or in the middle of a long-running operation. 在这些情况下，可能需要防止会话结束，并且可能更需要允许用户选择是否要让会话结束的情况。In these situations, it may be desirable to prevent the session from ending, and may be more desirable to allow users the option to decide whether or not to let the session to end. 可以通过处理事件来检测会话结束的时间 。You can detect when a session ends by handling the event. 如果应用程序需要阻止会话结束，则 传递到事件处理程序的参数将公开 设置为 `true` (默认值为 `false`) 的。If an application needs to prevent the session from ending, the argument that is passed to the event handler exposes the that you set to `true` (the default value is `false`). 如果 未处理或在未取消的情况下进行处理， 则将调用并 引发事件。If is unhandled, or is handled without being cancelled, is called and the event is raised. 若要获取有关会话结束原因的详细信息，应用程序可以检查 ，这是 值 ( 和 ) 之一。To obtain more information about why the session is ending, an application can inspect , which is one of the values ( and ). 不是由控制台应用程序引发的。 is not raised by console applications. 仅在创建对象的线程上引发 。 is raised only on the thread that creates the object. (Xbap) 的 XAML 浏览器应用程序不会引发。 is not raised for XAML browser applications (XBAPs). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件并允许用户取消该事件。The following example demonstrates how to handle the event and allow the user to cancel it. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlingsessionendingxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)]

summary.span: 为由 指定的位置创建一个 Cookie。

span.span: Creates a cookie for the location specified by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是一项随机数据，在应用程序会话 (会话 cookie) 或跨应用程序会话 (持久性 cookie) 时，应用程序可以将这些数据存储在客户端计算机上。A cookie is an arbitrary piece of data that can be stored by an application on the client machine during application sessions (session cookies) or across application sessions (persistent cookies). 可以通过调用创建这两种类型的 cookie 。You can create both types of cookies by calling . Cookie 数据通常采用以下格式的名称/值对的形式：Cookie data typically takes the form of a name/value pair in the following format: `Name=Value` 将此格式的字符串传递给 ，以及应将 cookie 设置到的 位置 (通常为应用程序域) 。You pass a string of this format to , along with the of the location for which the cookie should be set (typically, the application domain). Cookie 是会话 cookie 还是永久性 cookie 取决于您传递到的 cookie 字符串是否 包含到期日期。Whether a cookie is a session cookie or a persistent cookie depends on whether the cookie string that you pass to includes an expiry date. 会话 cookie 的字符串不包括到期日期。The string for a session cookie does not include an expiry date. 持久 cookie 的字符串具有，并且必须采用以下格式：The string for a persistent cookie does, and must be in the following format: `NAME=VALUE; expires=DAY, DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS GMT` 永久性 cookie 存储在当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 安装的 Internet 临时文件文件夹中，直到它们过期，在这种情况下，会删除这些 cookie。Persistent cookies are stored in the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] installation's Temporary Internet Files folder until they expire, in which case they are deleted. 可以通过将应用程序的到期日期设置为过去的日期/时间值，从应用程序中删除持久性 cookie。You can delete a persistent cookie from your application by setting its expiry date to a date/time value that is in the past. 有关中的 cookie 概述 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] ，请参阅 [导航概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview)。For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview).

exception.span: 如果在尝试创建指定的 Cookie 时发生问题，则会由 函数（由 调用）引发一个 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 错误。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] error is raised by the function (called by ) if a problem occurs when attempting to create the specified cookie.

summary.span: 关闭一个应用程序。

span.span: Shuts down an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，应用程序停止运行。When is called, an application stops running. 可以通过处理 事件来检测应用程序何时停止运行，以执行任何适当的处理。You can handle the event to detect when an application is about to stop running, to perform any appropriate processing. 在以下情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 隐式调用： is implicitly called by Windows Presentation Foundation in the following situations: - 当 设置为时 。When is set to . - 当 设置为时 。When the is set to . - 当用户结束会话并且 事件未处理或未取消处理时。When a user ends a session and the event is either unhandled, or handled without cancellation. 显式调用会导致应用程序关闭，而不考虑 设置。Calling explicitly causes an application to shut down, regardless of the setting. 但是，如果将 设置为 ，则必须调用 以关闭应用程序。However, if is set to , you must call to shut down an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用时，应用程序将关闭，而不考虑是否 已取消任何打开窗口的事件。When is called, the application will shut down irrespective of whether the event of any open windows is canceled. 只能从创建了对象的线程调用此方法 。This method can be called only from the thread that created the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理 事件以设置退出代码。You can handle the event to set an exit code. 但是，如果显式调用 ，并且 仅处理以设置退出代码，则可以改为调用 。However, if you explicitly call , and you handle only to set an exit code, you can call instead. 只能从创建了对象的线程调用此方法 。This method can be called only from the thread that created the object. 有关退出代码的信息，请参阅。See for information on exit codes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在调用应用程序的方法时，应用程序才会停止运行 。Applications stop running only when the method of the Application is called. 可以隐式或显式方式进行关闭，如属性的值所指定 。Shut down can occur implicitly or explicitly, as specified by the value of the property. 如果将设置 为 ，则 当应用程序中的最后一个窗口关闭时，Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 隐式调用，即使将任何当前实例化的窗口设置为主窗口 (参阅 ) 。If you set to , Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) implicitly calls when the last window in an application closes, even if any currently instantiated windows are set as the main window (see ). 的 会导致 WPF 在关闭时隐式调用 ，即使当前打开了其他窗口也是如此。A of causes WPF to implicitly call when the closes, even if other windows are currently open. 某些应用程序的生存期可能不依赖于主窗口或最后一个窗口关闭的时间，也可能根本不依赖于 windows。The lifetime of some applications may not be dependent on when the main window or last window is closed, or may not be dependent on windows at all. 对于这些情况，需要将属性设置 为 ，这需要使用显式 方法调用来停止应用程序。For these scenarios you need to set the property to , which requires an explicit method call to stop the application. 否则，应用程序将继续在后台运行。Otherwise, the application continues running in the background. 可以从代码以声明方式 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 或从代码以编程方式进行配置。 can be configured declaratively from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] or programmatically from code. 此属性仅在创建对象的线程中可用 。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置 以指定必须显式关闭应用程序。The following example shows how to configure to specify that an application must be closed explicitly. summary.span: 在调用 对象的 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method of the object is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序在启动时可能会执行各种初始化任务，包括：A typical Windows Presentation Foundation application may perform a variety of initialization tasks when it starts up, including: - 处理命令行参数。Processing command-line parameters. - 打开主窗口。Opening the main window. - 正在初始化应用程序范围资源。Initializing application-scope resources. - 正在初始化应用程序范围的属性。Initializing application-scope properties. 您可以使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] ( 和分别) 指定主窗口和应用程序范围的资源 。You can declaratively specify the main window and application-scope resources using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] ( and , respectively). 但有时，只能在运行时以编程方式确定应用程序的资源或主窗口。Sometimes, however, the resources or main window of your application can only be determined programmatically at run time. 此外，应用程序范围的属性和命令行参数只能以编程方式使用。Additionally, application-scope properties and command-line parameters can only be used programmatically. 可以通过处理事件来执行编程初始化 ，其中包括：Programmatic initialization can be performed by handling the event, including the following: - 获取和处理命令行参数，该参数可从 传递给事件处理程序的类的属性中获取 。Acquire and process command-line parameters, which are available from the property of the class that is passed to the event handler. - 使用属性初始化应用程序范围资源 。Initialize application-scope resources by using the property. - 使用属性初始化应用程序范围的属性 。Initialize application-scope properties by using the property. - 实例化并显示一个 (或多个) windows。Instantiate and show one (or more) windows. > [!NOTE] > 还可以通过调用对象的静态方法来获取命令行参数 。Command-line parameters can also be acquired by calling the static method of the object. 但是， 要求完全信任才能执行。However, requires full trust to execute. 如果使用设置 ，则在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 处理事件之前，创建的主窗口无法从对象的属性或属性中获取。If you set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], the main window that is created is not available from either the property or the property of the object until after the event is processed. 如果在启动期间需要访问主窗口，则需要从事件处理程序中手动创建新的窗口对象 。If you need access to the main window during startup, you need to manually create a new window object from your event handler. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的应用程序使用 来指定凭据策略，则需要 在引发后设置， 否则，将在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 引发事件后直接将它设置为默认内部策略 。If your application uses to specify a credential policy, you need to set after is raised; otherwise, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] sets it to a default internal policy directly after the event has been raised. 传递给事件处理程序的命令行参数与 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] 传递到的查询字符串参数不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 。The command-line arguments that are passed to the event handler are not the same as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] query string parameters that are passed to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从独立的应用程序获取和处理命令行选项。The following example shows how to acquire and process command-line options from a standalone application. 如果提供了 **/StartMinimized** 命令行参数，则应用程序将打开处于最小化状态的主窗口。If the **/StartMinimized** command-line parameter was provided, the application opens the main window in a minimized state. [!code-xaml[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlestartupxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 无法检索和处理命令行参数，因为它们是使用部署启动的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)] (请参阅 [ (wpf) ) 部署 Wpf 应用程序 ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf) 。cannot retrieve and process command-line arguments because they are launched with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)] deployment (see [Deploying a WPF Application (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf)). 但是，它们可以检索和处理来自用于启动它们的 URL 的查询字符串参数。However, they can retrieve and process query string parameters from the URLs that are used to launch them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用在 应用程序启动时自动加载 UI 资源。You can use to automatically load a UI resource when an application starts. 下表显示了可以加载的 UI 资源的类型、打开它们的窗口的类型，以及可以将这些资源设置为的应用程序的类型 。The following table shows the types of UI resources that can be loaded, the type of window they are opened into, and the type of application that these resources can be set as the . |类型Type|窗口Window|应用程序类型Application type| |----------|------------|----------------------| |||仅限独立Standalone only| |||仅限独立Standalone only| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| 通常， 在中以声明方式设置属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。Typically, you set the property declaratively in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 但是，您可以 通过编程方式进行设置，如 事件处理程序，如果对于只能在运行时加载必要 UI 资源的应用程序，这会很有用。However, you can set programmatically, such as from a event handler, which is useful if for applications that can only load the necessary UI resources at run time. 例如，如果 UI 资源的名称存储在配置文件中，应用程序可能等到运行时加载其资源。For example, an application might wait until run time to load its resources if the name of the UI resource is stored in a configuration file. 无论是 以声明方式还是以编程方式进行设置，都不会加载相应的 UI 资源，直到 处理事件。Whether you set declaratively or programmatically, the corresponding UI resource is not loaded until after the event is handled. 因此，在处理时，不能从 属性或属性访问生成的窗口 。Consequently, you won't have access to the resulting window from either the property or the property when handling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将首先查看指定资源的应用程序范围资源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 应用程序范围的资源由管理 ，并从 属性公开。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果在应用程序范围的资源集中找不到指定的资源， 则接下来会搜索系统资源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系统资源是由用户定义的 shell 资源，包括颜色、字体和 shell 配置。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 它们 分别从、 和 类型公开为静态属性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 为了使用 获取它们，这些类型还会公开旨在传递到的资源键属性 ; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 由于 返回对象，因此如果找到该资源，则必须将返回的值强制转换为相应的类型。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. 此方法是线程安全的，可从任何线程调用。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 获取资源。The following example shows how to use to acquire a resource. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在线程上实例化窗口后，会立即将引用添加到， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 但不会添加由工作线程创建的窗口。A reference is automatically added to as soon as a window is instantiated on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread; windows that are created by worker threads are not added. 在 处理了其 事件之后以及引发事件之前，将自动移除引用 。A reference is automatically removed after its event has been handled and before its event is raised. 默认情况下，添加到属性的第一项 将变为 。By default, the first item added to the property becomes the . 此属性仅在创建对象的线程中可用 。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何枚举 属性以生成顶级 Windows 菜单，该菜单对 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] 应用程序（如 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] ）或多实例单文档界面 (SDI) 应用程序（如）通用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] 。The following example demonstrates how to enumerate the property to build a top-level Windows menu, which is common to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)], or multiple-instance Single Document Interface (SDI) applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#WindowMenuItemCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/WindowMenuItem.cs#windowmenuitemcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#WindowMenuItemCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/windowmenuitem.vb#windowmenuitemcode)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#mainwindowsetwindowsxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind1)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind2)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind2)]
